verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> died <S%H4194><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> also the LORD <S%H136><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> on a throne, <S%H3678><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> up, and his train <S%H7757><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Above <S%H4605><s%> it stood <S%H5975><s%> the seraphim: <S%H8314><s%> each <S%H259><s%> one <S%H259><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> wings; <S%H3671><s%> with two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and with two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and with two <S%H8147><s%> he did fly. <S%H5774><s%>

And one cried <S%H7121><s%> to another, <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4393><s%> of his glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And the posts <S%H520><s%> of the door <S%H5592><s%> moved <S%H5128><s%> at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him that cried, <S%H7121><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Woe <S%H188><s%> is me! for I am undone; <S%H1820><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I am a man <S%H376><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and I dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips: <S%H8193><s%> for my eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Then flew <S%H5774><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the seraphim <S%H8314><s%> to me, having a live <S%H7531><s%> coal <S%H7531><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> which he had taken <S%H3947><s%> with the tongs <S%H4457><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And he laid <S%H5060><s%> it on my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> has touched <S%H5060><s%> your lips; <S%H8193><s%> and your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is taken <S%H5493><s%> away, <S%H5493><s%> and your sin <S%H2403><s%> purged. <S%H3722><s%>

Also I heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord, <S%H136><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Whom <S%H853><s%> <S%H4310><s%> shall I send, <S%H7971><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> will go <S%H3212><s%> for us? Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Here <S%H2005><s%> am I; send <S%H7971><s%> me.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> you indeed, but understand <S%H995><s%> not; and see <S%H7200><s%> you indeed, but perceive <S%H3045><s%> not.

Make the heart <S%H3820><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> fat, <S%H8082><s%> and make their ears <S%H241><s%> heavy, <S%H3513><s%> and shut <S%H8173><s%> their eyes; <S%H5869><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they see <S%H7200><s%> with their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with their ears, <S%H241><s%> and understand <S%H995><s%> with their heart, <S%H3824><s%> and convert, <S%H7725><s%> and be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Lord, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H5704><s%> long? <S%H5704><s%> And he answered, <S%H559><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> be wasted <S%H7582><s%> without <S%H369><s%> inhabitant, <S%H3427><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> without <S%H369><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> and the land <S%H127><s%> be utterly desolate, <S%H8077><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have removed <S%H7368><s%> men <S%H120><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> away, and there be a great <S%H7227><s%> forsaking <S%H5805><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

But yet <S%H5750><s%> in it shall be a tenth, <S%H6224><s%> and it shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and shall be eaten: <S%H1197><s%> as a teil <S%H424><s%> tree, and as an oak, <S%H437><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> substance <S%H4678><s%> is in them, when <S%H834><s%> they cast <S%H7995><s%> their leaves: so the holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be the substance <S%H4678><s%> thereof.
